title: Lori Vallow terrifies Hubby Charles with an "Angel waiting to Destroy you," then he's shot dead!
itunes:title: Lori Vallow terrifies Hubby Charles with an "Angel waiting to Destroy you," then he's shot dead!
description:
Chad and Lori Vallow Daybell facing two new felony counts of conspiracy to commit destruction, alteration or concealment of evidence in the deaths of her two children, JJ and Tylee. Today Nancy Grace talks with deceased husband Charles Vallow's lawyer who says his client told him, if anything every happened to him that Lori Vallow and her brother Alex Cox would be responsible.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
